segments.text: This scene in the kitchen feels a bit heartbreaking to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in her task, missing everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, ruining the floor and cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle, unaware of the growing problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, but it's such a risky thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, one wrong move away from falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, reaching out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is peaceful, but inside it's neglected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these little hazards building up without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel in her hands seems like such a small focus amid the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she could see how much needs her attention right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to think of the accident that might come from this.
segments.speaker: PAR
